definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Slip-on construction with front and rear goring for a secure, comfortable fit.
sentences.chinese: 滑上建设一个安全，舒适合脚的前部和后部戈林。

sentences.english: The cooling water jackets are arranged on the welding torch from the front part to the back part.
sentences.chinese: 在焊炬上从前部到后部均设有冷却水套。
警官，我的车后部被撞了。

sentences.english: There was an infant squalling in the back of the church.
sentences.chinese: 有个婴儿在教堂后部大声啼哭。

sentences.english: Sprung axlebox side of rear truck.
sentences.chinese: 车的后部弹簧轴箱的一面。

sentences.english: There is a posterior midline fatty lesion consistent with lipoma.
sentences.chinese: 下后部中线位置脂性病变，符合脂肪瘤表现。

sentences.english: The other is Wernicke's area, farther back in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 另一个是脑后部的韦尼克氏区。

sentences.english: Last beam rear there are two all-metal tail rotor blades.
sentences.chinese: 尾梁后部有两个桨叶的全金属尾桨。

sentences.english: Fold left sleeve across front of garment. Inspect back of left armhole for seam appearance, seam stretch and needle holes.
sentences.chinese: 翻折左袖，检查左袖窿后部的车缝情况及缝骨牢度。

sentences.english: Exhaust air from rear side; galvanized steel molding frame, white coated steel cover.
sentences.chinese: 后部排风，镀锌板型材框架，白色彩钢板蒙板。

sentences.english: A window in the back of the bus is half open.
sentences.chinese: 公交车后部有扇窗户半开着。

sentences.english: She crossed to the upstage chair forcing the lead to turn his back to the audience.
sentences.chinese: 她穿过舞台后部的椅子强迫使他的背部对着观众。

sentences.english: Turn and face the rear of the horse, with your left hand holding the lead rope.
sentences.chinese: 专向马的后部，用你的左手拿住牵引索。

sentences.english: Her voice will carry far enough to the back of the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 她的声音足可以达到教室的后部。

sentences.english: Achilles (uh-KIL-eez) tendon rupture is an injury that affects the back of your lower leg.
sentences.chinese: 阿基里斯腱断裂是一种影响小腿后部的损伤。

definition: empennage (of an aircraft)/fletching (of an arrow)/fins (of a missile, rocket etc)/rear spoiler (of a car)
the front (nose) of a plane etc
